comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: Are there any new development plans that focus on BKB tokens? I saw the roadmap stalled in May 2021.

comments.author: CaVO32
comments.body: Quote from: rat03gopoh on May 30, 2022, 02:01:19 PMAre there any new development plans that focus on BKB tokens? I saw the roadmap stalled in May 2021.They may have stalled their roadmap from the ANN thread in May 2021 but when you take a look at their blog - https://blog.bitkeep.com/en/, they have active news and updates. But yes, where can we see the updated roadmap for this project? I didn't know that this wallet has been used extensively around the globe, it means, they are doing something right. If you have full control with your coins, then, that's very nice. But what will happen if the bitkeep server is down? Will it affect the wallet itself? Can you still access your wallet?

comments.author: Bitkeep Wallet
comments.body: #BitKeep, the top Web3.0 wallet in Asia, has launched “Crypto Red Packets” on June 1(HKT).The new feature intends to bring digital assets into mainstream social media products for the 1st time, aiming to provide universal access to the future of #Web3.https://blog.bitkeep.com/en/?p=781

comments.author: Bitkeep Wallet
comments.body: Quote from: rat03gopoh on May 30, 2022, 02:01:19 PMAre there any new development plans that focus on BKB tokens? I saw the roadmap stalled in May 2021.No new roadmap, we are working tirelessly to ensure the bkb token have the right Market base.You can always check our community group on Telegram and other medias for more information.

comments.body: 🔥#BitKeep, debuted the world’s 1st decentralized Crypto Red Packets on multiple mainnets.😃Among 13 mainnets, @BNBCHAIN, @0xPolygon accounted for 95% of #Crypto Red Packets sent since the launch, showing, in a sense, the landscape of global mainnets.Blog link: https://t.co/UNK8pY3M4v✅ Stay active BitKeep's announcement thread for event notifications & updates.
